name: Bounce-A-Bunch
description:
Avoid different obstacles when you can't stop bouncing in this small arcade game.

Made for an 8 hour challenge (tho finished in about 5 hours), in this fun but challenging game you'll have to avoid enemies and collect coins to get points.
Try to reach your high score and DON'T DIE!

The controls are simple:
AD/Left&Right Arrows to move

Thanks Kenney for the amazing assets
